name: To: You
description:
It's been years since your childhood friend moved away. Will you finally be brave enough to confess how you've always felt about her?

HOW TO PLAY

  • Write a heartfelt letter to your sweetheart 
  • Guide the balloon safely to her
  • See her response

TIPS: 

Don't end your sentence with any punctuation

Always capitalize your first word

Check the readme to see how to get all letter responses

CREDITS:

Developed & Drawn by: PixelatedBree

Engine: RPG Maker MV | Gotcha Gotcha Games

Plugins: Galv, Masked, Moghunter, Yanfly

Music: ruha (Pastel Tone Music) https://pasteltone-music.booth.pm/

Sound Effects: https://freesound.org (Leszek_Szary, MATRIXXX_, MLaudio, onikage22, sgrowe)
